reviewText: "How To Be a Player" Had me rolling  from beginning till the end..Bernie Mac was Hilarious.. and the story was cute and thorough. Baby I smell somethin stank.. what is it ? and she proclaims she doesn't know what he is talking about.. so he say's it again. "I SMELL SOMETHIN STANK" by then I was already fallin out.Then he says it smells like BO-D-USSY  in here ..
